data.title: HELP!!! I Got Lost and Found A VILLAGE That's Full of... MONSTERS! by RodaBlackfang
data.meta_description: [Update 0.5] A Monster Hunter Visual Novel set in the world of Monster Hunter itself!
data.text:
Version : 0.5.1 - Building Bonds Part 2

Hey!

If you're reading this then I guess that means you found my journal that I left behind. I was surprised too when I found out about the place. A village full of monsters? Who could've expected this, especially in our world where monsters are considered dangerous and need to be constantly monitored. Survival of the fittest... I guess.

There are so many faces that really caught my attention and I think you would like them too! Not only they helped me with myself but each have their own thing that make them feel like they are more than just "Monsters in a Forest".

Let me introduce you to...

A-Anyway! I left my journal behind hoping you can learn more about this amazing village and well... I won't spoil you for what happens next. I gotta keep you on your toes, after all. You can trust them and you need to help them in the future too. I've told my story, now I want you to pass it on and keep my story alive.

Not for my sake, but for the Monster Village.

- Guild Scriviner -

SCREENSHOTS

Hopkeeper Games and it's members/contributors are not related or affiliated by the Monster Hunter™ Franchise by Capcom. This is a Free Non-Canon fangame and was made as a passion project for those Monster Hunter fans that are also Furries/Scalies/Monster-lovers.

That being said, this game is ONLY FOR 18+ ADULTS.

This game contains scenes/events that may not be suitable for all ages.

As a two-man team, we really hope our efforts deliver a well and fun experience!

Writer/Programmer Character/CG Artist

Twitter: @RRuuichi Twitter: @DaSinBun

Since we are still in the development phase, there will be errors, misspellings, incomplete backgrounds, and/or non-intentional events. Comment on the respective devlogs about these bugs to make sure we are referring to the correct version of the game and as a list to go through. We do appreciate the helpful comments as well!

Thank you!

Frequently Asked Questions

HELP!!! I got Lost and Found A VILLAGE That's Full of... MONSTERS! is a non-profit Monster Hunter™ fangame. Some events and ideas in this story are not considered canon or part of the main story of the original source material.
